thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful venue, excellent service
thread.title_full: Beautiful venue, excellent service - Review of Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: VikaVolk90
title: Beautiful venue, excellent service
text: I would highly recommend this hotel if you're looking to live close to main shopping destinations, hip restaurants and nightlife. We've stayed at Plaza Athénée and Mandarin Oriental before, and I can definitely say that I preferred George V better in all aspects.
